message:
Merge pull request #9709 from MicrosoftDocs/main

Auto Publish – main to live - 2025-09-16 11:00 UTC

{"content":"The following is the commit files that have changed: [
  {
    "sha": "7785df268b1981ae5e2863fd7e2a097ffcf6d1d1",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/concept-custom-url-domain.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 7,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fconcept-custom-url-domain.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fconcept-custom-url-domain.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fconcept-custom-url-domain.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: concept-article\n-ms.date: 03/12/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to learn about personalizing my application’s sign-in endpoints with my own branding or naming instead of Microsoft’s default domain name by using a custom URL domain.\n ---\n@@ -25,11 +25,6 @@ Using a verified custom URL domain has several benefits:\n - It provides a more consistent user experience. From the user's perspective, they remain in your domain during the sign in process rather than redirecting to the default domain *<tenant-name>.ciamlogin.com*.\n - You mitigate the effect of [third-party cookie blocking](~/identity-platform/reference-third-party-cookies-spas.md) by staying in the same domain for your application during sign-in.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=CustomDomain)\n->\n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the \"custom URL domain name” use case.\n-\n ## How a custom URL domain works\n \n A custom URL domain lets you use your verified custom URL domain names as your applications' sign-in authentication endpoints. When you add a new custom URL domain name, you can associate it with a custom URL domain. Then a reverse proxy service, such as [Azure Front Door](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/frontdoor/), can use the custom URL domain to direct sign-ins to your application."
  },
  {
    "sha": "7a463603a2e3405f0e6356dcd18faf47ae791e24",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/how-to-add-attributes-to-token.md",
    "status": "modified",

    "changes": 8,

    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-add-attributes-to-token.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-add-attributes-to-token.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 04/14/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n ---\n \n@@ -19,12 +19,6 @@ User attributes are values collected from the user during self-service sign-up.\n \n You can specify which built-in or custom attributes you want to include as claims in the token that Microsoft Entra ID sends to your application.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=TokenAugmentation)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Add claims to security tokens from a REST API” use case.\n-\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - [Register the application](/entra/identity-platform/quickstart-register-app) with Microsoft Entra ID."
  },
  {
    "sha": "bd1ffe1842f0c580660565871e6defa420a06134",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/how-to-customize-branding-customers.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 7,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-customize-branding-customers.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-customize-branding-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-customize-branding-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 05/07/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.author: cmulligan\n ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n #Customer intent: As an it admin, I want to learn about the options for customizing the look and feel of the customer sign-in and sign-up experience.\n@@ -19,11 +19,6 @@ ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n After creating a new external tenant, you can customize the end-user experience. Create a custom look and feel for users signing in to your apps by configuring **Company branding** settings for your tenant. With these settings, you can add your own background images, colors, company logos, and text to customize the sign-in experiences across your apps.  \n You can also create user flows programmatically using the Company Branding Graph API.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=CompanyBranding)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Company branding” use case.\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - If you haven't already created your own Microsoft Entra external tenant, create one now."
  },

    "patch": "@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@ ms.service: entra-external-id\n  \n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 05/14/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro\n \n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to learn about how to add customized browser languages to my app's authentication experience.\n@@ -29,11 +29,6 @@ This article explains how to customize the browser language for your app's authe\n - [Create a user flow](how-to-user-flow-sign-up-sign-in-customers.md).\n - Review the file size requirements for each image you want to add. You might need to use a photo editor to create the right-sized images. The preferred image type for all images is PNG, but JPG is accepted.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=Language)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Language customization” use case.\n-\n ## Add browser language under Company branding\n \n 1. Sign in to the [Microsoft Entra admin center](https://entra.microsoft.com) as at least an [Organizational Branding Administrator](~/identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#organizational-branding-administrator).\n@@ -207,4 +202,4 @@ When no longer needed, you can remove the language customization from your exter\n \n ## Next steps\n \n-- [Customize the branding and end-user experience](how-to-customize-branding-customers.md)\n\\ No newline at end of file\n+- [Customize the branding and end-user experience](how-to-customize-branding-customers.md)"
  },

You can modify the text that displays next to the checkbox and include hyperlinks.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PolicyAgreement)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Add links to terms of use and privacy policies” use case.\n-\n To configure a single-select checkbox, follow these steps:\n \n 1. On the **Page layouts** page, find the attribute with data type of **Boolean** that you want to configure.\n@@ -207,4 +202,4 @@ When users sign-in to your app, the app receives an ID token, which includes the\n \n [Add attributes to the ID token returned to your application](how-to-add-attributes-to-token.md).\n \n-[Create a sign-up and sign-in user flow for customers](how-to-user-flow-sign-up-sign-in-customers.md).\n\\ No newline at end of file\n+[Create a sign-up and sign-in user flow for customers](how-to-user-flow-sign-up-sign-in-customers.md)."

From the app\n \n :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/how-to-enable-password-reset-customers/sspr-flow.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot that shows the self-service password rest flow.\":::\n \n-\n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=SSPR)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Self-service password reset” use case.\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - If you haven't already created your own external tenant, create one now."

    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,

    "changes": 7,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-facebook-federation-customers.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-facebook-federation-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-facebook-federation-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 05/22/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, has-azure-ad-ps-ref, azure-ad-ref-level-one-done, sfi-ga-nochange\n #Customer intent: As a developer or IT admin, I want to add Facebook as an identity provider for my external tenant so that customers can sign in to my applications using their Facebook accounts.\n ---\n@@ -18,11 +18,6 @@ ms.custom: it-pro, has-azure-ad-ps-ref, azure-ad-ref-level-one-done, sfi-ga-noch\n \n By setting up federation with Facebook, you can allow customers to sign in to your applications with their own Facebook accounts. After you've added Facebook as one of your application's sign-in options, on the sign-in page, customers can sign-in to Microsoft Entra External ID with a Facebook account. (Learn more about [authentication methods and identity providers for customers](/entra/external-id/customers/concept-authentication-methods-customers).)\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=Social)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Sign-in with a social account” use case.\n-\n ## Create a Facebook application\n \n To enable sign-in for customers with a Facebook account, you need to create an application in [Facebook App Dashboard](https://developers.facebook.com/). For more information, see [App Development](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/development)."
  },

    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 03/06/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, has-azure-ad-ps-ref, sfi-ga-nochange\n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to\n ---\n@@ -18,11 +18,6 @@ ms.custom: it-pro, has-azure-ad-ps-ref, sfi-ga-nochange\n \n By setting up federation with Google, you allow customers to sign in to your applications with their own Google accounts. After you add Google as one of your user flow's sign-in options, customers can sign up and sign in to your application with a Google account. (Learn more about [authentication methods and identity providers for customers](concept-authentication-methods-customers.md).)\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=Social)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Sign-in with a social account” use case.\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - An [external tenant](how-to-create-external-tenant-portal.md).\n@@ -122,4 +117,4 @@ At this point, the Google identity provider has been set up in your Microsoft En\n \n - [Add Facebook as an identity provider](how-to-facebook-federation-customers.md)\n - [Add Apple as an identity provider](how-to-apple-federation-customers.md)\n-- [Add OpenID Connect as an external identity provider](how-to-custom-oidc-federation-customers.md)\n\\ No newline at end of file\n+- [Add OpenID Connect as an external identity provider](how-to-custom-oidc-federation-customers.md)"
  },

    "sha": "a7100db4f20775b9ea3b297db7325ea51decdaa1",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/how-to-microsoft-accounts-federation-customers.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 7,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-microsoft-accounts-federation-customers.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-microsoft-accounts-federation-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-microsoft-accounts-federation-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 03/12/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.author: cmulligan\n ms.custom: it-pro, has-azure-ad-ps-ref, azure-ad-ref-level-one-done\n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to\n@@ -19,11 +19,6 @@ ms.custom: it-pro, has-azure-ad-ps-ref, azure-ad-ref-level-one-done\n By setting up federation with Microsoft account (live.com) using OpenID Connect (OIDC) identity provider, you enable users to sign up and sign in to your applications using their existing Microsoft accounts (MSA).\n After you add the MSA (live.com) as one of your user flow's sign-in options, customers can sign up and sign in to your application with their Microsoft account.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=MSA)\n->\n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Microsoft personal account (live.com)” use case.\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - An [external tenant](how-to-create-external-tenant-portal.md)."
  },
  {
    "sha": "bea69c0f75367a00fedc84cde2a70193f0c883ff",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/how-to-multifactor-authentication-customers.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 7,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-multifactor-authentication-customers.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-multifactor-authentication-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-multifactor-authentication-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 11/20/2024\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to add multifactor authentication to my custoconsumer and business customer app.\n ---\n@@ -23,11 +23,6 @@ Multifactor authentication (MFA) adds a layer of security to your applications b\n \n This article describes how to enforce MFA for your customers by creating a Microsoft Entra Conditional Access policy and adding MFA to your sign-up and sign-in user flow.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=MFA)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Multi-factor authentication](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=MFA)” use case.\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - A Microsoft Entra external tenant."
  },

    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-use-app-roles-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-use-app-roles-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 04/14/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-ga-nochange\n ---\n \n@@ -25,22 +25,10 @@ Microsoft Entra External ID allows you to define application roles for your appl\n \n When Microsoft Entra External ID issues a security token for an authenticated user, it includes the names of the roles you've assigned the user or group in the security token's roles claim. An application that receives that security token in a request can then make authorization decisions based on the values in the roles claim.\n \n-\n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=RBAC)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Role-based access control” use case.\n-\n ## Groups\n \n Developers can also use security groups to implement RBAC in their applications, where the memberships of the user in specific groups are interpreted as their role memberships. When an organization uses security groups, a groups claim is included in the token. The groups claim specifies the identifiers of all of the groups to which the user is assigned within the current external tenant.\n \n-\n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=GBAC)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Group-based access control” use case.\n-\n ## App roles vs. groups\n \n Though you can use app roles or groups for authorization, key differences between them can influence which you decide to use for your scenario."
  },
  {
    "sha": "27a4c270a1fcb85a2cf260984b43634210a74ad0",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/how-to-user-flow-sign-up-sign-in-customers.md",

    "additions": 2,
    "deletions": 7,
    "changes": 9,

    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-user-flow-sign-up-sign-in-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Fhow-to-user-flow-sign-up-sign-in-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: how-to\n-ms.date: 04/23/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.reviewer: kengaderdus\n ms.custom: it-pro, seo-july-2024, sfi-image-nochange\n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to create and customize a user flow, which determines the sign-up and sign-in experience for my customer users.\n@@ -24,11 +24,6 @@ You can create a simple sign-up and sign-in experience for your customers by add\n \n This article describes how to create a sign-in and sign-up user flow. After you create the user flow, the next step is to [add your application to the user flow](how-to-user-flow-add-application.md). You can create multiple user flows if you have multiple applications that you want to offer to customers. Or, you can use the same user flow for many applications. However, an application can have only one user flow. \n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=OnlineRetail)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Online retail” use case.\n-\n ## Prerequisites\n \n - **A Microsoft Entra external tenant**: Before you begin, create your Microsoft Entra external tenant. You can set up a <a href=\"https://aka.ms/ciam-free-trial?wt.mc_id=ciamcustomertenantfreetrial_linkclick_content_cnl\" target=\"_blank\">free trial</a>, or you can create a new external tenant in Microsoft Entra ID.\n@@ -82,4 +77,4 @@ Follow these steps to create a user flow a customer can use to sign in or sign u\n ## Next steps\n \n - [Add your application to the user flow](how-to-user-flow-add-application.md)\n-- [Create custom user attributes and customize the order of the attributes on the sign-up page](how-to-define-custom-attributes.md).\n\\ No newline at end of file\n+- [Create custom user attributes and customize the order of the attributes on the sign-up page](how-to-define-custom-attributes.md)."
  },

You can use this feature to view, query, and analyze user activity data in the Microsoft Entra admin center. This feature can help you uncover valuable insights that can aid strategic decisions and drive business growth.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=UserInsights)\n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Application user activity” use case.\n-\n ## Supported scenarios\n \n You can use the user insights feature for the following scenarios:"

    "sha": "026fa7876c5594dfc0ca8ea8969895df11f753ef",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/overview-customers-ciam.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 2,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 8,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Foverview-customers-ciam.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Foverview-customers-ciam.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Foverview-customers-ciam.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ ms.service: entra-external-id\n  \n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: overview\n-ms.date: 06/11/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, seo-july-2024\n \n #Customer intent: As a dev, devops, or it admin, I want to learn about identity solutions for apps for consumers and business customers.\n@@ -101,10 +101,6 @@ Microsoft Entra Conditional Access brings signals together, to make decisions, a\n \n Conditional Access policies are enforced after the user has completed first-factor authentication. For example, if a user's sign-in risk level is high, they must perform MFA to gain access. Alternatively, the most restrictive approach is to block access to the application.\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=CA)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Conditional Access and multifactor authentication” use case.\n ### Multifactor authentication (MFA)\n \n Microsoft Entra MFA helps safeguard access to data and applications while maintaining simplicity for your users. Microsoft Entra External ID integrates directly with Microsoft Entra MFA so you can add security to your sign-up and sign-in experiences by requiring a second form of authentication. You can fine-tune MFA depending on the extent of security you want to apply to your apps. Consider the following scenarios:\n@@ -133,4 +129,4 @@ Effective May 1, 2025, [Azure AD B2C](/azure/active-directory-b2c/) is no longer\n \n - See our [training, live demos, and videos](reference-training-videos.md).\n - Learn more about [planning for Microsoft Entra External ID](concept-planning-your-solution.md).\n-- See also the [Microsoft Entra External ID Developer Center](https://aka.ms/ciam/dev) for the latest developer content and resources.\n\\ No newline at end of file\n+- See also the [Microsoft Entra External ID Developer Center](https://aka.ms/ciam/dev) for the latest developer content and resources."

  {
    "sha": "ac4ff4c5568c221100c3a5afd546f9307a769168",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/overview-solutions-customers.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 20,
    "changes": 21,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Foverview-solutions-customers.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Foverview-solutions-customers.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Foverview-solutions-customers.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ manager: dougeby\n ms.service: entra-external-id\n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: concept-article\n-ms.date: 04/14/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n ---\n # Overview of the Woodgrove Groceries demo\n@@ -16,12 +16,6 @@ ms.custom: it-pro, sfi-image-nochange\n \n Microsoft Entra External ID offers solutions that let you quickly add intuitive, user-friendly sign-up and sign-up experiences for your consumer and business customer apps. The Woodgrove Groceries demo environment illustrates several of the most common authentication experiences that can be configured for your apps.\n \n-## Get started\n-\n-To try out the demo environment, go to [Woodgrove Groceries](https://woodgrovedemo.com/) and select from a list of use cases that illustrate different sign-in options and business cases.\n-\n-:::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/overview-solutions-customers/demo-woodgrove.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Woodgrove Groceries demo home page.\":::\n-\n ## Use cases\n \n ### Sign-up with an email and password\n@@ -32,8 +26,6 @@ One of the most common ways for users to sign up for an app is by creating an ac\n \n When you enter an email address to create an account, your email is verified through a one-time passcode. Then you can create a new password and provide more details, such as your name, country or region, and other information. Once your account is created, your email becomes your sign-in ID.\n \n-To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Online retail](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=OnlineRetail)” use case.\n-\n ### Self-service password reset\n \n Self-service password reset (SSPR) gives users the ability to change or reset their password, with no administrator or help desk involvement. If a user's account is locked or they forget their password, they can follow prompts to unblock themselves and get back to work.\n@@ -42,8 +34,6 @@ Before you start, make sure you've run one of the sign-up use cases to create an\n \n To set up self-service password reset for your customers see the [Enable self-service password reset](how-to-enable-password-reset-customers.md) article.\n \n-To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Self-service password reset](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=SSPR)” use case.\n-\n ### Sign-in with a social account\n \n You can offer your customers the ability to sign in with their existing social or enterprise accounts, without having to create a new account. On the sign-in page, select one of the identity providers, such as Google, Facebook or Apple. Then you're redirected to the selected provider's to complete the sign-in process.\n@@ -52,8 +42,6 @@ You can offer your customers the ability to sign in with their existing social o\n \n To allow your customers to sign up and sign in using their social accounts, you can navigate to **External Identities** > **All identity providers** in the admin center. You can find the exact steps for adding Facebook, Google and Apple as identity providers in the following links for [Google](how-to-google-federation-customers.md), [Facebook](how-to-facebook-federation-customers.md) and for [Apple](how-to-apple-federation-customers.md). \n \n-To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Sign-in with social accounts](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=Social)” use case.\n-\n <!--Ask PM about custom OIDC.-->\n \n ### Sign-up with a one-time passcode\n@@ -72,25 +60,18 @@ In this use case, you can sign in or sign up with your credentials. Then after y\n \n If you want to understand how custom extensions work, you can refer to the [Custom extension overview](~/identity-platform/custom-extension-overview.md) article. For information on custom claims providers, you can check out the [Custom claims provider](~/identity-platform/custom-claims-provider-overview.md) article.\n \n-To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Prepopulate sign-up attributes](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PreAttributeCollection)” use case, or the “[Validate sign-up attributes](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PostAttributeCollection)” use case.\n-\n ### Edit your account\n \n Profile editing policy lets you manage your profile attributes, like display name, surname, given name, city, and others. After you update your profile, sign out and sign in again.\n \n To edit your profile on the **Woodgrove Groceries** page, select the icon with your name, located in the top-right corner of the page. After making your changes, select **Save**.\n \n-\n-To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Edit your account](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=ProfileEdit)” use case.\n-\n ### Delete your account\n \n If you would like to delete your account and personal information, visit the **Delete my account** page. Once you delete your account, you can't reactivate it. After a couple of minutes, you'll be able to sign up again with the same credentials.\n \n To delete your account on the **Woodgrove Groceries** page, select the icon with your name located in the top-right corner of the page. On the **Edit your profile** page select **Delete your account**.\n \n-To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Delete your account](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=DeleteAccount)” use case.\n-\n ## Next steps\n \n - Learn more about [planning for Microsoft Entra External ID](concept-planning-your-solution.md)."
  },
  {
    "sha": "1325b4549a9903c439a4bd7235654acb00fa70fa",
    "filename": "docs/external-id/customers/reference-training-videos.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 7,
    "changes": 8,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Freference-training-videos.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Freference-training-videos.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fexternal-id%2Fcustomers%2Freference-training-videos.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ ms.service: entra-external-id\n \n ms.subservice: external\n ms.topic: concept-article\n-ms.date: 06/25/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.custom: it-pro\n \n \n@@ -32,12 +32,6 @@ In the training module, you'll:\n \n To start the training, go to [Guided project – Build a sample app to evaluate Microsoft Entra External ID](https://aka.ms/eeid/training-module) and follow the units in order.\n \n-## Woodgrove Groceries live demo\n-\n-The Woodgrove Groceries live demo app is a fictional grocery store that incorporates Microsoft Entra External ID into its online shopping platform. It illustrates several common authentication experiences that can be configured for your apps. To explore the demo environment, visit [Woodgrove Groceries](https://woodgrovedemo.com/). On the right side of the screen, choose the **Select a use case** button, or use [this link](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=Default). Then, choose from a list of features and use cases related to authentication experiences.\n-\n-:::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/overview-solutions-customers/demo-woodgrove.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Woodgrove Groceries demo home page.\":::\n-\n ## Visit our video library\n \n Microsoft Entra External ID videos are incorporated within our documentation and can also be found under the [Microsoft Security Channel](https://www.youtube.com/microsoft-security) and [Microsoft Entra External ID playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3ZTgFEc7Lythpts59O9KOVuEDLWJLLmA) on YouTube. These videos range from conceptual explanations and practical \"how-to\" guides to extensive series designed as courses."
  },
  {
    "sha": "69b301d5f39ae6ed5774dee3233df4737b816628",
    "filename": "docs/identity-platform/custom-claims-provider-overview.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 7,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fidentity-platform%2Fcustom-claims-provider-overview.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fidentity-platform%2Fcustom-claims-provider-overview.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fidentity-platform%2Fcustom-claims-provider-overview.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@ author: cilwerner\n manager: pmwongera\n ms.author: cwerner\n ms.custom: \n-ms.date: 05/04/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.reviewer: jasuri\n ms.service: identity-platform\n \n@@ -41,11 +41,6 @@ An event listener is a procedure that waits for an event to occur. The custom au\n \n To set up a custom claims provider, you'll need to [create a REST API with a token issuance start event](./custom-extension-tokenissuancestart-setup.md), then [configure a custom claim provider for a token issuance event](./custom-extension-tokenissuancestart-configuration.md).\n \n-> [!TIP]\n-> [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=TokenAugmentation)\n-> \n-> To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “Add claims to security tokens from a REST API” use case.\n-\n ## Authentication events trigger for Azure Functions client library for .NET\n \n <!--As an API developer, to be able to handle token issuance start custom extensions, I need to easily interact with the request object and easily build a response object without necessarily needing to know the exact format of the request or response"
  },
  {
    "sha": "a6cf5f6d68a257da1a7df2cc5e74dfc1842b7986",
    "filename": "docs/identity-platform/custom-extension-attribute-collection.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 12,
    "changes": 13,
    "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fidentity-platform%2Fcustom-extension-attribute-collection.md",
    "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a/docs%2Fidentity-platform%2Fcustom-extension-attribute-collection.md",
    "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Fidentity-platform%2Fcustom-extension-attribute-collection.md?ref=714fac2f78a446d8c4b4aa0234c0586284d9075a",
    "patch": "@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ description: Learn how to develop and register a Microsoft Entra custom authenti\n author: msmimart\n manager: CelesteDG\n ms.author: mimart\n-ms.date: 04/28/2025\n+ms.date: 09/16/2025\n ms.service: identity-platform\n ms.topic: how-to\n titleSuffix: Microsoft identity platform\n@@ -19,18 +19,7 @@ ms.custom: sfi-image-nochange\n This article describes how to extend the user sign-up experience in Microsoft Entra External ID for customers. In customer sign-up user flows, event listeners can be used to extend the attribute collection process before attribute collection and at the time of attribute submission:\n \n - The **OnAttributeCollectionStart** event occurs at the beginning of the attribute collection step, before the attribute collection page renders. You can add actions such as prefilling values and displaying a blocking error.\n-\n-    > [!TIP]\n-    > [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PreAttributeCollection)\n-    > \n-    > To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Prepopulate sign-up attributes](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PreAttributeCollection)” use case.\n-    \n - The **OnAttributeCollectionSubmit** event occurs after the user enters and submits attributes. You can add actions such as validating or modifying the user's entries.\n-\n-    > [!TIP]\n-    > [![Try it now](./media/common/try-it-now.png)](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PostAttributeCollection)\n-    > \n-    > To try out this feature, go to the Woodgrove Groceries demo and start the “[Validate sign-up attributes](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=PostAttributeCollection)” use case, or the “[Block a user from continuing the sign-up process](https://woodgrovedemo.com/#usecase=BlockSignUp)” use case.\n     \n In addition to creating a custom authentication extension for the attribute collection start and submit events, you need to create a REST API that defines the workflow actions to take for each event. You can use any programming language, framework, and hosting environment to create and host your REST API. This article demonstrates a quick way to get started using a C# Azure Function. With Azure Functions, you run your code in a serverless environment without having to first create a virtual machine (VM) or publish a web application.\n "
  },
  {
    "sha": "e8604673e203594dd7de6f99e7b9466edd6a1428",
    "filename": "docs/identity-platform/custom-extension-onattributecollectionstart-retrieve-return-data.md",
    "status": "modified",
    "additions": 1,
    "deletions": 6,
    "changes": 7,

ai_summary.Response: The commits update documentation for Microsoft Entra External ID, primarily focusing on customer identity and access management. Key changes include updating `ms.date` metadata across multiple files, removing old demo screenshots and references, and refining the "Try it now" links to point to specific use cases within the Woodgrove Groceries demo. Additionally, there's a minor adjustment in the PageDNS tutorial to add two patterns to the Reply URL field.
